title: #86: 2020 Wrap Up
description:
To say that 2020 was a disaster is an understatement. Fear was taken to new levels, fueled by the co-conspirators in the Mainstream Media and government, and common sense was essentially made illegal.

In just a few short months billions of people put on masks that don’t work to prevent a virus with a 99.74% survival rate and a median death age of 80 years old. Shopping and working were deemed “non-essential” and “dangerous”, but rioting and protesting were fine.

From fires in Australia and the west coast of America to the COVID hysteria to George Floyd and the BLM movement to elections and the fraud surrounding them to asteroids and Murder Hornets, 2020 will probably go down as the worst year of our lives, so let’s look back at the insanity and be thankful that we made it out alive and with our sense of humor.
